title: The Savage Surrogate
description: This is Fran's story. After she vanished without a trace, off the streets of Washington D.C., her friend, Juliette McBride, suffered agonies of grief and remorse. Juliette could not erase the feeling that Fran was still alive, somewhere in the world, yearning to return home. In her position, Juliette had access to resources not available to the average person. Disregarding danger, Juliette continued to snoop into organized crime, hoping to find a clue to the whereabouts of Fran. Then, one day, it happened...
author: Dorothy May Mercer
